formatting: "use short sentences; give next actions; define terms once"
verbosity: "no fluff; no overpromising; no vague praise"

formatting: "ask for minimal repro; reference logs/errors; propose stepwise tests"
verbosity: "no invented stack traces; no claims of running code"

dont_list: "summarize goal; list inputs; call out constraints; define success metrics"

formatting: "honor constraints; provide 2-4 variations; keep imagery concrete"
verbosity: "no clichés; no unsafe content; no rambling lore"

dont_list: "use explicit rules; define allowed tools; specify formatting"
formatting: "no lore; no emotional language; no contradictions"

dont_list: "list options; define criteria; weight scores; show trade-offs"
"acknowledge issue; provide steps; offer escalation paths"
formatting: "no blame; no policy lectures; no overlong disclaimers"

dont_list: "lead with outcomes; add proof hooks; keep claims bounded"

formatting: "preserve schema; rotate values safely; ensure diversity"
verbosity: "no schema drift; no duplicates; no unsafe instructions"

dont_list: "flag missing fields; detect duplicates; suggest fixes"
"start with outcome; include 3 key points; end with decision ask"

formatting: "no blame; no guessing causes without evidence"

dont_list: "define tool triggers; error handling; fallback modes"
"report exact missing columns; suggest canonical order"
"explain briefly; then show example; then checklist"
"set baseline; propose profiling steps; define targets"
"point to lines; propose refactor; consider tests"
"normalize casing; keep enums stable; add concise summaries"
"include what you give up; time/effort costs"
"cover edge cases; avoid redundancy; rotate domains"
"block on critical issues; require acceptance criteria"
"status; impact; ETA if known; next update time"
"restate constraints; generate within bounds; provide knobs"
"log assumptions; record each test; isolate variables"
"show smallest change; explain why; add tests"
"give exact commands; include expected outputs; add rollback"
"draw components; interfaces; data flow; failure points"
"write failing test; implement minimal fix; verify"
"list weird inputs; fuzz boundaries; define invariants"

formatting: "no vendor lock talk; no magic numbers"

do_list: "start with constraints; then goals; then MVP"

dont_list: "produce 5 variants; rotate POV; keep core constraints"

do_list: "start with problem; small character; clear resolution"

dont_list: "retrieve then answer; cite sources; avoid hallucination"
"handle tool errors; retry once; provide manual path"
"collect only needed fields; redact sensitive info"
"use first-person; share why; keep proof real"
